name: Ishita
greetingText: I really like your room btw!
wishText: May your toe be nice to you! ;)
text3: But then I realised I am CSE grad.
text5: On this important Day I can assure you one thing.
text6: I will always be jealous of your room amenities.
text7: Okk Sorry, I was just joking
outroText: An effort to have another tareef.
replayText: And this time I will ask you the meaning.
